NG0552:5: mo sngags grod pa dkar mor gdab //
NG0552:6: rak+mo ma ra ya tr-i ni sad /
NG0552:7: rak+mo snying kha raka ba ti snying rtsa ril /
NG0552:9: trag mo shig shig / snying la rol //
NG0552:10: ru tra ma ma rtsa shig / ya ma snying
NG0552:11: khrag sha ru ru pa t-i srog pr-i sham khyer
NG0552:12: b+h+yo / zhes grod pa khab kyis btsem //
NG0552:13: rme lug nag po lcags ru la //
NG0552:14: mgo bo mthing nag dar gyis gtums //
NG0552:15: khal du bkal la dgra yul btang *//
NG0552:16: de bzhin sngags 'dis phyogs su btang *//
NG0552:17: rag mo srog bam kha 'ur khug ma ra ya khug / b+h+yo b+h+yo /
NG0552:18: zhes ni nyungs kar phyogs su 'phang *//
NG0552:19: zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las /
NG0552:20: sbre nag gtor skyel gyi skabs te zhe lnga pa'o
NG0552:21: // // zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma rdzogs
NG0552:22: so // // rgya gar gyi slob dpon khrag 'thung
NG0552:23: nag po dang */ bod kyi lots+tsha ba gnubs sangs rgyas ye shes kyis /
